tha-ap395:13.2: puthupāsaṇḍanissitā → mūḷhā saccavinissiṭā (s2, s3) | phutā saccavinissitā (pts1) | phuṭṭhasaccavinissaṭā (mr)
tha-ap395:15.3: susamo santo → susīlo asamo santo (bj, pts1) | paññavā yuttacāgo ca (s2, s3)
tha-ap395:17.1: Saṅgātigo → saṅgātīto (s2, s3) | saṅghātīto (pts1), hatamado → gatamado (s2, s3, pts1) | tamanudo (mr)
tha-ap395:21.2: saddhammañcāpi vaṇṇayi → dhammañcāpi pakittayi (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap395:27.4: Phuseyyuṃ → aññātañca vijāneyyaṃ passeyyaṃ (s2, s3) | aññātañca vijāneyyaṃ phasseyyam (pts1) | passeyya (mr)
